name: Inversion (itch) (Hidden Halcyon)
description:
Inversion is a game about exploring the depths of the earth. Using a limited supply of light sources, experience what it's like to enter a large cave system and explore what is there. Just remember, you only have a limited time supply of light so look at what you can and get out before you become another soul lost in the dark...

Available for all Oculus platforms. May get ported to other platforms in the future.
